greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions (ordered partitions) of n into distinct parts such that number of parts is even.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Index entries for sequences related to compositions
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(i*(i+1)/2<n, 0, `if`(n=0,
irem(p+1, 2)*p!, add(b(n-i*j, i-1, p+j), j=0..min(1, n/i))))
mathematica: nmax = 45; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[(2 k)! x^(k (2 k + 1))/Product[1 - x^j, {j, 1, 2 k}], {k, 0, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Feb 09 2020
